thread.title: Yuliya.V
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Yuliya.V

author: Yuliya.V
title: Yuliya.V
text: I bought shoes of ecco and absolutely love the style and quality, the service is great too only takes 5 days to deliver to Ireland. I like the 28 day return policy which gives plenty of time to do it. I never had to return anything yet so, so far I am happy with everything. The tracking of the parcel is a great feature as well. All over is an good service and quality.
